Title: Permits a real property tax freeze to be granted to certain persons sixty-five years of age or older
Summary: Permits persons sixty-five years of age or older to be granted a real property tax freeze in a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to permitting persons sixty-five years of age or older to be granted a real property tax freeze in a city with a population of one million or more
